sections.heading: Acknowledgement and legal
sections.summary: The 2024-2025 RSV Prevention Program for infants in Ontario resourcewas developed using the Centre for Effective Practice’s (CEP’s) integrated knowledge translation approach as part of the Knowledge Translation in Primary Care (KTinPC) Initiative. This approach ensures that clinicians are engaged throughout the development processes through the application of user-centered design methodology. This resource was created with information from and in collaboration with the Chief Medical Officer o...
